website_summaries.verdict: High quality 4K HDMI cable that boasts gold-plated connectors
pros: Tangle-free cord that doesn't curl up after use
Touch of color makes cord easy to track

customer_reviews.title: Seems very well built. The cable is not very flexible. Will hinder the ability to swivel my 60" 4K TV.
customer_reviews.text: Seems very well built. The cable is not very flexible. Will hinder the ability to swivel my 60" 4K TV. The other issue with the inflexibility is the HDMI connector seems to bend a bit since HDMI ports are on the TV. Hope the connector will hold up. Have 4 of them so is not an issue just with one cable. All are like it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Potter

customer_reviews.title: Great Cable For The Price
customer_reviews.text: I plugged it into my ultra 4K Samsung 65" curved TV and it's like I'm watching in a theater. This is a great product. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: ET

customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I wouldn't have to change my other cord or switch it every time I would watch a DVD.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality cables! Very sturdy and perfect for installations where you are routing them behind drywall!
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: As TV technology advances, so does the need (in many cases) to change out connector cables. High speed cables have become a necessity to satisfactorily pass picture/sound information between source and end product. And you don't need to spend a fortune to achieve satisfaction. I paired the purchase of these cables (sold as a pair) with the Eteckcity 4K HDMI Switcher. I can say unequivocally that I was very satisfied with my cable purchase. The length and build quality was exactly what I expected (and received). If you are in the market for high-speed HDMI cables, look no further than NTW. You (and your wallet) will be glad you did.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Gulcynski

customer_reviews.title: And it was a great price too
customer_reviews.text: We have a new 4K HD TV and these cables have helped tremendously with the speech lag. Without them the sound would be a little behind the picture. Worth the purchase! And it was a great price too. Would definitely purchase again from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: missingthailand

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked for about 10 minutesw then dropped out. Could not establish connection so went back to old cable.
customer_reviews.author: kaw

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Our new Vizio 4k tv looks amazing. So glad I invested in these. Even if they're the same cable as 1080p, the price for a pair of cables is incredibly cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to convert my RCA jacks on my television
customer_reviews.author: AllieB

customer_reviews.title: NOT ULTRA DEEP COLOR CAPABLE
customer_reviews.text: When I set my tv with these cables to ULTRA deap color I get white flickering at times.. NOT GOOD CABLES.. Correction might not be the cable
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Save your money by not buying these!
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money on these. If anything this cable made my picture look worse than my average hdmi cable. All the reviews saying it helped their picture must've been upgrading from those red, white, and yellow hookups cuz this did nothing for mine.
customer_reviews.author: Jscottgp2011

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: Not as expected works but the quality is the same as any other hdmi cord
customer_reviews.author: Andrew B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good value, works very well on my new 4K TV.
customer_reviews.author: michael

product_meta.title: NTW NHDMI2P-012 12' Ultra HD PURE 4K High Speed HDMI Cable with Ethernet
product_meta.description: Length:Pure 4K HDMI| Style:12 FeetLifetime Warranty Worry Free Performance Available in 3', 6', & 12' 3' Part#: NHDMI2P-003 UPC: 678138182006 6' Part#: NHDMI2P-006 UPC: 678138182013 12' Part#: NHDMI2P-012 UPC: 678138182020
feature_bullets: PURE - Exceptional Quality Supports highest resolution HD Audio/Video at 4X the clarity of 1080p, as well as lower resolution formats of 720p, 1080i, and 1080p PURE - Quick Transfer Speed Transfer speed of 18.0 Gbps

PURE - Audio Return Channel Adds audio channel that enables "upstream" audio connections via HDMI Simplifies audio connection between TV and Audio/Video receiver Seamlessly connects 4K electronic equipment
PURE - HDMI Ethernet Channel Handles multiple Ethernet enabled devices through a single connection Highest standard of certification from the World Wide HDMI organization
